mapper.select:
select sum(costs) med, sum(drug_costs) drug, sum(anti_costs) anti, dept_name, dept_code from (select sum(l.costs) costs, sum(l.drug_costs) drug_costs, l.patient_id, l.visit_id, l.funcdeptcode dept_code, l.funcdeptname dept_name, sum(l.anti_costs) anti_costs from ias_pat_info_scd l where 1 = 1 and is_orderflag = '1'
and l.rpt_date >= to_date(#{pd.beginDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and l.rpt_date < to_date(#{pd.endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
group by l.patient_id, l.visit_id, l.funcdeptcode, l.funcdeptname) group by dept_code, dept_name
order by SUM(s.costs)
order by SUM(s.costs)
order by SUM(s.costs) desc
order by sum(drug_costs)
order by sum(drug_costs) desc
order by sum(anti_costs)
order by sum(anti_costs) desc

select sum(decode(t.item_class, 'A', t.costs, 0)) drug, sum(t.costs) med, sum(decode(t.item_class, 'A', decode(t.is_anti, '1', t.costs, 0), 0)) anti, t.ordered_by_dept dept_name, t.ordered_by_dept_code dept_code from outp_orders_costs t, (select drug_no_local from pdss.drug_map where 1 = 1 group by drug_no_local) d where t.item_code = d.Drug_No_Local
and trunc(t.visit_date) >= to_date(#{pd.beginDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and trunc(t.visit_date) < to_date(#{pd.endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
group by t.ordered_by_dept, t.ordered_by_dept_code
order by SUM(s.costs)
order by SUM(s.costs)
order by SUM(s.costs) desc
order by sum(drug_costs)
order by sum(drug_costs) desc
order by sum(anti_costs)
order by sum(anti_costs) desc

select t.drug_code, t.drug_name, t.drug_spec, t.firm_id, t.units, sum(cost) costs, sum(amount) amounts from (
select m.drug_code, m.drug_name, m.units, m.package_spec drug_spec, m.firm_id, m.cost cost, m.amount amount from PEAAS.Dr_Drugdaycost m, pdss.Drug_Map d where m.Drug_Code = d.Drug_No_Local
and m.dr_date >= to_date(#{pd.beginDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and m.dr_date < to_date(#{pd.endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
union all select h.drug_code, h.drug_name, h.drug_units units, h.drug_spec drug_spec, h.firm_id, to_char(h.costs) cost, to_char(h.amount) amount from dr_drug h, pdss.Drug_Map d where h.Drug_Code = d.Drug_No_Local
and h.rpt_date >= to_date(#{pd.beginDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and h.rpt_date < to_date(#{pd.endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
) t group by t.drug_code, t.drug_name,t.drug_spec, t.firm_id, t.units
order by costs desc
